pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, February 14, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

The Prime Minister will host a call with provincial and territorial premiers.

The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks and hold a media availability with Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance Chrystia Freeland and Minister of Justice and Attorney General of Canada David Lametti. Minister of Public Safety Marco E. L. Mendicino and President of the Queen’s Privy Council for Canada and Minister of Emergency Preparedness Bill Blair will be in attendance.

Third floor foyer
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-960-7519
    Toll-free: 1-877-413-4814
    Pass code: 1623295#
